title: New Fortinet RCE flaw in SSL VPN likely exploited in attacks
description: Fortinet is warning that a new critical remote code execution vulnerability in FortiOS SSL VPN is potentially being exploited in attacks. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes Copilot issue blocking Windows 11 upgrades
description: Microsoft has lifted a compatibility hold that blocked upgrades to Windows 11 23H2 after resolving an issue that caused desktop icons to move erratically when using Windows Copilot on multi-monitor systems. [...]

title: Hyundai Motor Europe hit by Black Basta ransomware attack
description: Car maker Hyundai Motor Europe suffered a Black Basta ransomware attack, with the threat actors claiming to have stolen three terabytes of corporate data. [...]

title: Ivanti: Patch new Connect Secure auth bypass bug immediately
description: Today, Ivanti warned of a new authentication bypass vulnerability impacting Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA gateways, urging admins to secure their appliances immediately. [...]

title: Microsoft unveils new 'Sudo for Windows' feature in Windows 11
description: Microsoft introduced 'Sudo for Windows' today, a new Windows 11 feature allowing users to execute commands with elevated privileges from unelevated terminals. [...]

title: Android XLoader malware can now auto-execute after installation
description: A new version of the XLoader Android malware was discovered that automatically executes on devices it infects, requiring no user interaction to launch. [...]

title: US offers $10 million for tips on Hive ransomware leadership
description: The U.S. State Department offers rewards of up to $10 million for information that could help locate, identify, or arrest members of the Hive ransomware gang. [...]

title: Fake LastPass password manager spotted on Apple’s App Store
description: LastPass is warning that a fake copy of its app is being distributed on the Apple App Store, likely used as a phishing app to steal users' credentials. [...]

title: Data breaches at Viamedis and Almerys impact 33 million in France
description: Data breaches at two French healthcare payment service providers, Viamedis and Almerys, have now been determined to impact over 33 million people in the country. [...]

title: Google teases a new modern look for sign-in pages, including Gmail
description: Google is on the brink of refreshing its sign-in pages, including Gmail, with a sleek, modern makeover. [...]

title: Fortinet warns of new FortiSIEM RCE bugs in confusing disclosure
description: Fortinet is warning of two new unpatched patch bypasses for a critical remote code execution vulnerability in FortiSIEM, Fortinet's SIEM solution. [...]
